## Exit criteria (must be checkable)

- [ ] `main` green and working
- [ ] All P0 (HIGH PRIORITY) issues in this milestone closed OR explicitly carried with reason

## Focus areas

(examples)

- Pipeline: focus on data forwarding and bypassing, and control flow (e.g., branch prediction)
- Compiler: focus on code generation and optimization, especially for loops and function calls
- Peripherals: focus on memory-mapped I/O, interrupt handling, and peripheral integration
